questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source A.  What is the publisher suggesting about Hollywood’s attitude towards the Chinese film industry? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Sources B and C. How far do these two sources agree on the impact of American media? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Sources D and E. Having read Source D, are you surprised by Source E? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Study Source F. How useful is the source as evidence that the influence of Hollywood is welcome in the rest of the world? Explain your answer.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: “The American entertainment industry helps the growth of film industries worldwide.” Using sources in this case study, explain how far you would agree with this statement

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Extract 1 reflects on the presence of a widening income gap in Singapore. In your opinion, what can be done to manage the impacts of a widening income gap in Singapore? Explain your answer using two strategies.

questions.subject: Humanities(Social_Studies)
questions.question: Extract 2 and 3 reflect on assimilation and integration as approaches to coping with ethnic diversity.
